'''Gathering of Stars''' is a part of the [[A Parade of Providence]] event in Version 3.6. Complete ''[[Gathering of Stars]]'' to unlock the event segment.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Gathering of Stars 1.png
|text1  = {{Color|help|Rotate the Artisan Astrolabes}} in the Gathering of Stars event or adjust the {{Color|help|Astrolabe Sections' heights}} to complete the specified image.
|image2 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Gathering of Stars 2.png
|text2  = Once the {{Color|help|angle}} and {{Color|help|height}} are at a suitable location, that Artisan Astrolabe's star will light up. Once all such stars light up, the picture will be completed.
|image3 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Gathering of Stars 3.png
|text3  = After a certain amount of time elapses following the challenge's beginning, you can ask for help from the organizer and obtain a hint, which will show the intended star positions.
}}
